JobFullDesc:
The New Business Director is responsible for selling Outcome-Based Marketing (OBM) solutions and Advisory Services to IPG Agencies & Clients. They will prospect into our Agency Partners, mine leads from Matterkind account teams and develop forward-thinking OBM programs that deliver on client outcomes with a strategic mix of cross-channel demand generation tactics. They will sell Advisory Services to clients and prospects from within IPG Agencies with customized solutions to solve the unique and complicated digital advertising and technology challenges Brands are facing. This role will be responsible for developing a quality pipeline of prospects, running Senior level meetings, developing proposals, and closing business.
A successful candidate is a highly motivated, senior salesperson who is an excellent presenter, a creative thinker, and is comfortable running meetings with Senior executives. They should be detail-oriented, have an entrepreneurial spirit and tenacity to get things done. They possess superior interpersonal skills and love building relationships. They are comfortable juggling multiple priorities in a fast-paced environment. They will be expected to have a deep understanding of the digital and performance landscape(s) as well as the AdTech and MarTech ecosystems. They have a talent for responding effectively to industry direction, customer needs, and competitive positioning.
Job Responsibilities

Identify, evaluate, sell, negotiate and close OBM and Advisory opportunities to IPG Agencies & Clients

Develop and grow a quality pipeline of new contacts as targeted potential clients through on-going networking and relationship building

Work closely with clients to understand their needs, budget, and timeframe to provide custom OBM solutions as well as relevant Advisory Services

Develop sales materials, go-to-market approach and client proposals

Represent Matterkind in OBM & Advisory meetings with IPG Agency Leads and Clients

Build strong working relationships with Agency stakeholders

Manage and maintain pipeline reporting tools, including revenue projections

Field and respond to requests for OBM and Advisory Services

Maintain a deep understanding of Matterkind capabilities, products, and differentiators

Work cross-functionally with internal groups including the OBM Activation Leads, Advisory Services Team, Matterkind Team Leads, Finance, Legal and more.

Desired Skills & Experience

Experience in sales, business development, account management with a leading online advertising agency, network, technology firm or consulting firm focused on Outcome Based Marketing, Performance Media or Digital Advertising/Technology

Sales, pitching, and business development experience

Experienced in Outcome-Based Marketing/Demand Generation (includes Lead Generation, CPA/PPC advertising, Affiliate) with a proven track record in selling multi-channel, demand-gen programs

Experienced in digital advertising, addressable, data and martech and/or previous experience in data & digital media consulting

Willing to go the extra mile to service clients and close business

Outstanding relationship and business builder; strong business acumen

Excellent verbal and written communicator, excellent presentation skills

Excellent with PowerPoint

Forward/innovative and creative thinker who is hardworking and eager to grow a business

A self-starter mentality, ability to adapt and thrive in a fast-paced environment

High attention to detail and ability to manage multiple, competing priorities simultaneously

Ability to work collaboratively as part of a cross-functional team

Constantly educates self on industry and keeps up on changes or trends

Possess high levels of creativity, independence and flexibility
